name: Cave Explorer (djidane535)
description:
Mouse / Keyboard  :

  • QWASD / Arrows : Go forward / backward
  • Left mouse button / Space key  : Rising up.
  • Right mouse button /  CTRL : Diving.
  • Return : "START button"

Gamepad (Xbox Controller Layout)  :

  • D-Pad / Left Stick: Go forward / backward
  • A : Rising up.
  • X : Diving.
  • Star : "START button"

Note: This game has been developed for the GameJam GBJAM8.
